ai.summary: A 7.1 km moderate riverside walk in the UK along the Maidenhead Millennium Walk Marlow Link, connecting Maidenhead with Marlow via scenic Thames-side paths. The route offers gentle gradients, varied surfaces, and pleasant views over the river.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily riverside paths with a mix of surfaced pavements, compact gravel, and occasional grassy or earth tracks. Expect uneven sections and damp ground after rain; some shaded stretches along the water with open viewpoints across the Thames.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for UK weather and daylight hours. Wear sturdy footwear and be prepared for wet or muddy sections near the river. Stay on marked paths, keep a safe distance from the water, and supervise children. Check for closures or events that may affect access and carry a charged phone with emergency contacts.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March to October) is ideal for this route, when daylight and typically milder conditions enhance river views. Winter walks are possible but may be cold, wet, and darker.

seo.title: Maidenhead Millennium Walk Marlow Link – 7.1 km Moderate UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Explore the 7.1 km Maidenhead Millennium Walk Marlow Link, a moderate riverside hike in the UK along the Thames between Maidenhead and Marlow. Terrain, safety tips and gear included.
seo.h1: Maidenhead Millennium Walk Marlow Link – 7.1 km Moderate Hike
